i18n.displayName: Batman: Arkham City Game of the Year Edition
i18n.longDescription:
ONLY IN THE GAME OF THE YEAR EDITON: Get new storylines, enemies, environments and playable characters. Play through a separate story with Harley Quinn’s revenge pack. Explore multiple new challenge maps—playable as Batman, Robin, Nightwing or Catwoman. Get extra skins for Batman and the other characters, plus the ability to play as Catwoman in her own unique storyline.

One year after the events at Arkham Asylum, Gotham has become a police state. The new mayor has walled off an entire ghetto, transforming it into the open-air prison of Arkham City, where Gotham's worst criminals battle each other for supremacy. Now, Batman finds himself within its walls, where he must confront his old enemies while solving a new mystery. This is Batman: Arkham City Game of the Year Edition for PC Download.

Gameplay based on the awarding-winning Arkham Asylum has evolved while remaining true to its comic book origins. Devastate the opposition with new combat moves and gadgets such as smoke pellets and ice grenades. Battle new villains like The Penguin and Two-Face while facing down old enemies like The Joker and Harley Quinn. Arkham City includes a Catwoman subplot as well, giving you command of the seductive femme fatale in a series of high-stakes heists.

Award-winning writer Paul Dini penned the script, and fan favorites Kevin Conroy and Mark Hamill return to provide voices for Batman and The Joker. With an environment five times larger than Batman: Arkham Asylum, players will be fully immersed in the sights and sounds of Batman's world.

Strap on your utility belt and take to the rooftops of Gotham in a whole new chapter to the Dark Knight saga: Arkham City.

Game of the Year Edition features:

• Harley Quinn's Revenge Pack: Batman is lured back into Arkham City by its last remaining super-criminal, Harley Quinn. Now more dangerous than ever and leading a homicidal gang of her own, she is hell-bent on taking her revenge against the Dark Knight. This pack includes more than two hours of additional gameplay, an all-new storyline and enemies, the ability to play as both Batman and Robin, new environments and collectables.
• Arkham City Skins Pack: Contains seven bonus Batman skins: 1970s Batman, Year One Batman, The Dark Knight Returns, Earth One, Batman Beyond, Animated Batman and Sinestro Corps Batman. The seven Batman skins can be used in storyline mode upon completion of main story and all challenge maps.
• Challenge Map Pack: The pack contains three all new challenge maps: The Joker's Carnival, Iceberg Lounge and The Batcave. These challenge maps are playable as Batman and any of the downloadable playable characters Catwoman, Nightwing and Robin.
• Catwoman Pack: Play as Catwoman in a unique storyline. This pack includes two bonus Catwoman skins: Long Halloween Catwoman and Animated Catwoman.
• Nightwing Pack: Play as Nightwing, who uses his own unique gadgets and special moves and is playable in all challenge maps in the game. Plus, get two additional challenge maps that are included with the pack: Wayne Manor and Main Hall. The pack also contains a bonus Animated Nightwing character skin.
• Robin Pack: Become the Boy Wonder and fight crime with his unique gadgets and special moves. Robin is playable in all challenge maps in the game, as well as two additional challenge maps that are included with the pack: Black Mask and the unique Freight Train Escape challenge map, which features arcade-style brawler gameplay in 2D. The pack also offers two bonus character skins: Red Robin and Animated Robin.
